Package org.gbif.api.model.occurrence

Class DownloadRequest

java.lang.Object
org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.DownloadRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PredicateDownloadRequest, SqlDownloadRequest
public abstract class DownloadRequest extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a request to download occurrence records. This is the base class for specific type of downloads: predicate based downloads and SQL downloads.
See Also:
